statements.select: SELECT PayoffID, PayoffName,PayoffType, AsPay, Quantity, NeedChangePay, CardNo FROM OrderPayoff WHERE OrderID = #value# AND IsVoided = 0
SELECT PayoffID, PayoffName,PayoffType, AsPay, Quantity, NeedChangePay, CardNo FROM OrderPayoff WHERE OrderID = #value# AND IsVoided = 1
